targets.rawSql: SELECT sum(ingressBytes) ingressBytes FROM deltafi."deltafiles" WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) LIMIT 100

SELECT time, flow || ' ' || subflow AS subflow, bytes " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, annotations['subflow'] AS subflow, sum(ingressBytes) AS bytes 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) )
GROUP BY flow, subflow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)
SELECT sum(files) ingressBytes FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) LIMIT 100

SELECT flow, annotations['subflow'] AS subflow, sum(ingressBytes) value 
FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) 
GROUP BY flow, subflow
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT flow, annotations['subflow'] AS subflow, sum(files) value 
FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) 
GROUP BY flow, subflow
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT time, flow || ' ' || subflow AS subflow, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, annotations['subflow'] AS subflow, sum(files) AS values 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) )
GROUP BY flow, subflow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT time, flow || ' ' || subflow AS subflow, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, annotations['subflow'] AS subflow, sum(egressed) AS values 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) )
GROUP BY flow, subflow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT time, flow || ' ' || subflow AS subflow, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, annotations['subflow'] AS subflow, sum(errored) AS values 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) )
GROUP BY flow, subflow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT time, flow || ' ' || subflow AS subflow, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, annotations['subflow'] AS subflow, sum(filtered) AS values 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) )
GROUP BY flow, subflow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT flow, annotations['subflow'] AS subflow, sum(ingressBytes) as values
FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and (flow IN (${flow}))
GROUP BY flow, subflow
ORDER BY values DESC

SELECT flow, annotations['subflow'] AS subflow, sum(files) as files
FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND (flow IN (${flow}))
GROUP BY flow, subflow
ORDER BY files DESC

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT flow FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
list.label: Flow
list.name: flow
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT flow FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
